response.original_title: 堕ちてゆく人妻 禁断の母娘
response.overview: Yoshino— wife to Ryōichi and mother to Marino—has always cherished her perfect family life. But when her daughter brings home her handsome boyfriend, Haruo, Yoshino can’t help but see shades of her youthful husband in this young meat. His easy laughter and confident stride stir something deep inside her, and she finds herself drawn to his sexy aura.  As the house falls silent one evening, Yoshino lost in her own thoughts in the shower when she senses someone behind her—Haruo, quickly apologizing before retreating. Yet the image of her slutty body etched in his mind. Yoshino feels a tremor of shame and excitement ripple through her flaming body.  Once the two became irresistibly alone, Haruo sweeps Yoshino into his arms. Her heart pounds as his hands molest her body, unleashing a craving she’s long denied. And just as their lips meet in a desperate kiss, the unexpected sound of Marino’s footsteps sends a jolt through them—threatening to expose the delicious forbidden sexual desires.
response.title: The Fallen Wife: Forbidden Mother‑Daughter Desires
